html:
11.24.19  2:02 pm   Bill where are the videos sir I demand content damnit 

     me too

11.24.19  12:51 pm   I think it is always good to be humble but how much is too much? 

     when it looks super fake

11.24.19  12:49 pm   can i go to mars

     not right now

11.24.19  12:48 pm   how to make video

     i'm figuring that out right now

11.24.19  12:42 pm   Did you enjoy being on a podcast?

     every time i've been on a podcast i have enjoyed it, except the first time which i did not enjoy because i forgot which way is up, during it

11.24.19  12:38 pm   Why are you so cool?

     i dropped myself on my head when i was young

11.24.19  12:37 pm   ceiling fan or standing fan? 

     i personally am frightened more by ceiling fans

11.24.19  12:37 pm   Are you aware of any successful (well known) creators who were inspired by you?

     i can't be entirely sure whom

      Is inspiring people one of your main missions in this game?

     yes

11.24.19  12:34 pm   Would 15 year old Bill be shocked as all hell to see who'll grow up to be?

     no, but very glad

11.24.19  12:30 pm   lately i feel like im crumbling over the pressure and expectations of other people. Have you ever experienced this,

     yes

      and if so, how do you cope with it?

      do something very different from what they are expecting

11.24.19  12:24 pm   Are you good at chess?

     only when i get to be the queen

11.24.19  12:15 pm   Do you think the key a song is in has any impact on the feel of the song?

     just how high or low it is, only within a small range

      Because you could transpose a song into any other key and it would still be the same song. So is the key signature significant at all?

     it would change the tone of the lead instrument, especially if it's voice. it would change the tone of the chordal instruments too, but not if you went through and re-worked and flipped the chord arrangements to still be within the right range

11.24.19  11:55 am   What is your favorite thing to do

     chores

11.24.19  11:54 am   Do you like plaid shirts

     that depends on the color scheme

11.24.19  11:54 am   What are grapes, comically?

     testicles, would be my first and very obvious suggestion

11.24.19  11:40 am   I think humor is one of the most important things in the world. Would you agree?

     yes

11.24.19  11:33 am   people keep calling you the bob ross of music, do you agree with them?

     that would be a little more true if i did more tutorials

11.24.19  11:32 am   Was "content" kind of poking fun at the people who go super in-depth with analyzing your songs?

     no, it was the natural followup to "thinkin bout doin some content"

11.24.19  11:30 am   Hey Bill I'm in a choir right now and i think that i'm pretty good at singing but do you have any advice that will make my singing exceptional?

     usually one of the first things i recommend is to join a choir, but you've already done that. so instead i will try to recommend something that may strengthen your individual singing character/personality, which is to sing by yourself and try improvising the lyrics/melody as you sing, while accompanying yourself on a chordal instrument

11.24.19  11:19 am   Have you ever thought of quitting music 

     no

11.24.19  11:00 am   would you host the oscars?

     that sounds so terrifying it might just be the perfect idea

11.24.19  10:48 am   What do you think the point of life is?

     anything you can imagine

11.24.19  10:40 am   Is it ok if I listen to Christian songs for fun and not to praise god 

     sure

11.24.19  10:34 am   if you could be any mythical creature, what would it be?

     person

11.24.19  10:30 am   Do you take your shoes off indoors? 

     yes, and put them on also

11.24.19  8:49 am   Are you making new songs

     oh hell yea

11.24.19  8:36 am   Do apples need pants?

     maybe sweaters would be more suitable

11.24.19  8:34 am   what's your favourite metallica album?

     black. come at me

11.24.19  7:59 am   What is your favourite band? And if you don't have one, who's your favourite singer/song writer?

     it's not a contest. wait actually yes it is. but it's not over yet and everyone keeps surpassing each other

11.24.19  7:20 am   do you think we should protect the planet as humans?

     we should probably use machines to help

      cuz if we don't take action, the world is definitely going to be destroyed by our own hands, but many people think they'll be dead by then so they simply don't care. it's just frustrating to hear for such a tree-hugger like me 

     the planet will probably be fine, it's more a question of will it still suit our very particular environmental requirements for survival. if we were weird enough to knock the thing off balance, we're gonna have to learn to be even weirder to deal with the consequences. the good news is we are steadily getting more weird at a vehement pace

11.24.19  6:35 am   Do you put the cereal before the milk, or the milk before the cereal?

     use a hyper particle collider to slam them together. see what you get

11.24.19  6:19 am   how do you not feel cynical?

     i actually never learned what that means

11.24.19  6:18 am   when a tree falls in a forest and no one is around, does the tree make a sound?

     yes

11.24.19  5:41 am   what are you working on?

     learning the basics of physics simulations

11.24.19  5:26 am   How do you stay motivated

     to do what

11.24.19  5:24 am   what colour curtains do you have

     black

      and would you change them to a different colour?

     no

11.24.19  5:20 am   how to confidently do what you dont know how to do

     do it totally wrong

11.24.19  5:16 am   would you please answer this question in pink text?

     no way

11.24.19  4:32 am   What kind of quotes do you have on the walls in your early reality videos?

     those seemed to be mostly from influential leaders. a lot of religious leaders, presidents, company CEOs, etc

11.24.19  4:19 am   why is everybody so dumb?

     they are not, you are just extremely smart

11.24.19  4:18 am   are aliens real

     take a look in the mirror

11.24.19  3:06 am   Do you decorate youe christmas tree the same way you decorate your video's?

     no, the tree itself is usually the decoration for something else

11.24.19  2:27 am   Can you code in any programming languages?

     sort of maybe almost

11.24.19  1:26 am   If ghosts can walk through walls and glide down stairs, why don't they fall through the floor?

     they can go through the floor if they want but they are probably not affected by gravity, so downward force is probably not a requirement

11.24.19  12:49 am   please tell joke 

     the universe is probably infinite in size

11.24.19  12:29 am   I feel I am a lot more productive when I am focused, do you feel the same?

     yes. i'm also a lot more focused when i'm productive

11.24.19  12:07 am   will your new video be coming soon to a dank river valley near me?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.23.19  10:58 pm   any advice for someone looking to learn about making music

     listen to a lot of music, and get some kind of piano keyboard

11.23.19  10:39 pm   will you ever make changes to this website?

     always do

11.23.19  10:16 pm   Can I fly a jet

     not unless you wear a very special hat
